projects.title: Board Full Edit Functionality
projects.summary: Add full board interactivity: scrolling, add cards, edit cards, priority, notifications.
projects.details:
**Goal:** Elliott can fully manage board from the UI without Aurora editing JSON.

**Features Requested (Jan 30):**
1. ✅ Scrolling - all cards visible
2. ⏳ Add Project button - create new cards
3. ⏳ Edit card functionality (click → edit all fields)
4. ⏳ Priority editing from UI
5. ⏳ Telegram notification when Elliott creates/edits
6. ⏳ Card shows 'added by Elliott' flag so Aurora knows to review

**Definition of Done:**
1. Elliott can scroll to see ALL cards
2. Elliott can add new project cards from board UI
3. Elliott can edit ANY field on ANY card (title, summary, details, priority)
4. Aurora receives Telegram notification on card create/edit
5. Cards have metadata showing who added/edited them

**Status:** Scrolling fixed 1/31. Edit features not yet implemented.

projects.title: Create a Proactive Employee Workflow
projects.summary: Define and implement a system for Aurora to proactively identify and execute tasks without direct instruction.
projects.details:
**Goal:** Aurora works autonomously, produces completed work overnight.

**Key Insight (Jan 31):**
Heartbeat timing is unreliable for precise scheduling. Board review needs to happen BEFORE action crons fire.

**Architecture:**
- Prep cron runs 5-10 min before action crons (board review, spawn agents)
- Action crons execute scheduled work
- Heartbeat for background checks only (email, calendar, etc.)

**User Stories:**
1. As Aurora, I check the board 5 min before action crons
2. As Aurora, I delegate appropriate tasks to sub-agents
3. As Aurora, I produce deliverables without being asked
4. As Elliott, I wake up to completed work

**Definition of Done:**
1. Prep cron created (runs 5 min before action crons)
2. Board items have clear definitions of done
3. Aurora demonstrates autonomous task completion over 3+ days
4. Morning deliverables appear without prompting

projects.details:

**Components:**
- Working memory (ACTIVE-CONTEXT.md)
- Daily logs (memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md)
- Long-term curated (MEMORY.md)
- Relationship history (relationship.md)

**Definition of Done:**
1. Clear documentation of memory architecture
2. Automated cleanup/consolidation process
3. Effective context retrieval across sessions

**Status:** Conceptually designed, needs implementation work.
